Title: Gone Girl
Overview: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.
Tagline: You don't know what you've got 'til it's...
Keywords: based on novel, marriage crisis, disappearance, cheating husband, missing person, search party, criminal lawyer, wife murder, murder suspect, missing wife
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Regency Enterprises, New Regency Pictures, Pacific Standard, TSG Entertainment, Artemple - Hollywood
Cast: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Carrie Coon
